property.name: lastRoom
property.value: SELECT Max(Room) AS LastRoom FROM dbo.Worker;

property.name: workerListByRoom1
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Room` LIMIT 26;

property.name: workerListByRoom2
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Room` WHERE Room BETWEEN 4103 AND 5001;

property.name: workerListByRoom3
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Room` WHERE Room BETWEEN 3301 AND 4102;

property.name: workerListByRoom4
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Room` WHERE Room BETWEEN 2402 AND 3203;

property.name: workerListByRoom5
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Room` WHERE Room BETWEEN 101 AND 2401;

property.name: workerListByCost
property.value: SELECT Room , Name , ProfessionName , EnduranceName , Cost FROM dbo.`View Worker List By Cost` LIMIT 26;

property.name: insert
property.value: INSERT INTO dbo.Worker ( Room , Name , Profession , Endurance , Cost ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

property.name: updateWorker
property.value: UPDATE dbo.Worker SET name = ? , profession = ? , endurance = ? , cost = ? WHERE (room = ?);
